attributes.action: help small and medium sized businesses through the current financial crisis by increasing their available working capital by delaying the date that businesses are required to pay their quarterly VAT over to HM Revenue and Customs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The simplest and easiest way to help the liquidity of small and medium sized businesses is to defer their VAT payments. It works at once. 
• It can help all. 
• Requires no bureaucracy. 
• Has no administrative costs.
The government can control three variables: how many days delay in payment; how this may vary according to size of the business; and the total amount that each business can defer. Moreover it can adjust these parameters quickly as the economic situation changes

This simple common sense solution will keep people in jobs and demand in the economy.

And it can be done NOW!
